latex:
If the margin made on an article costing $ C$ dollars and selling for $ S$ dollars is $ M=\frac{1}{n}C$, then the margin is given by:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ M=\frac{1}{n-1}S \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ M=\frac{1}{n}S \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ M=\frac{n}{n+1}S \\
\textbf{(D)}\ M=\frac{1}{n+1}S \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ M=\frac{n}{n-1}S$
